column5: I spend enough time on it...  http://glasstoilets.com/catalog/trout-p-43.html  They are canuckian as well!!
I wanna know what you're drinking to make you want to Google toilets.
Camp Jiggy jiggy will never be the same
WOW....thats so cool.i would like one as well..LOL..LOL..LOL thanks for sharing that TJ...cheers
Brings a whole new meaning to the name "toilet trout"  Rob C
well you would think they would use crappie in the crapper
They're brown trout Terry...I think it's fitting.
A bit disturbing if they are see-through.  LOL.

There's always the danger that knowing a trout was looking up yer butt might induce a little sphincter clampage.  I saw these seats in the Fishing Store in Stratford. They worry me. Visions of a barbed hook in the cheek come to mind.  JF
You mean none of you guys have ever seen one of those at someones house? Just wait til you see one with the little blue jug in the tank!
And I would like to know what you were thinking to make you want to Google toilets.  On second thought... nevermind.
